seed.name: Limited Access
seed.description: This access level gives limited access in security users and groups. Assigned to Guests, by default.

seed.name: Read
seed.description: Can read objects and data. Assigned to security group Users, by default.

seed.name: Contribute
seed.description: Can edit, add, delete objects and data. Assigned to Contributors, by defalut

seed.name: Design
seed.description: Can modify application layout, create models, pages and views. Assigned to Designers, by default

seed.name: Full Control
seed.description: This access level contains all permissions. Assigned to Administrators, by default.
